properties.Name: Nassau County DSS – Emergency Housing / Shelter Intake
properties.Opening time: Mon–Fri 8:00 AM–4:00 PM (after-hours hotline available)
properties.Short description: County emergency housing intake/referrals; after-hours number for emergency assistance.

properties.Name: The INN – Emergency Shelters (Program)
properties.Address: 211 Fulton Ave, Hempstead, NY 11550 (administrative / contact address)
properties.Opening time: Shelters staffed 24/7 year-round (program); placement requires DSS referral
properties.Short description: Operates emergency shelters (family shelter + shelter for single men) in Nassau County; DSS referral required for placement.

properties.Name: Bethany House of Nassau County (Women & Women with Children)
properties.Opening time: Main office: Mon–Fri 9:00 AM–5:00 PM (shelter access by DSS referral)
properties.Short description: Emergency shelter for women and women with children (no men).

properties.Name: Nassau Haven Emergency Youth Shelter (FCA)
properties.Address: 377 Oak Street, 5th Floor, Garden City, NY 11530 (program contact; shelter location may be confidential)
properties.Short description: 12-bed, gender-inclusive emergency shelter for runaway and homeless youth ages 10–20; short-term housing and case management.

properties.Name: MOMMAS House (Young mothers & babies)
properties.Opening time: N/A (residential program; contact for intake)
properties.Short description: Residential program supporting young mothers and their babies; supportive services.

properties.Name: Nassau County Homelessness Prevention & Rapid Re-Housing Program
properties.Address: 40 Main Street, 1st Floor, Suite B, Hempstead, NY 11550
properties.Opening time: Not listed publicly (call for hours)
properties.Short description: Homelessness prevention + rapid re-housing assistance (intake/helpline).

properties.Name: Project Warm Bed / Nassau County Winter Homeless Hotline (WARMBED)
properties.Opening time: Call ONLY after 5:00 PM (winter only)
properties.Short description: Referrals for a place to sleep for the night during winter conditions.

properties.Name: Nassau County Temporary Warming Space (former Family Court building)
properties.Opening time: Open 24/7 once activated (activated under specified wind chill conditions)
properties.Short description: Temporary warming space activated during severe cold; 24/7 while activated.

properties.Name: Safe Harbor (resource listed for homelessness-related support)
properties.Opening time: Not listed publicly
properties.Short description: Program/resource listed in local housing/homeless resource directory (call for details).

properties.Name: Nassau–Suffolk Coalition for the Homeless (LICH) – Helpline & Referrals
properties.Address: 38 Old Country Road, Garden City, NY 11530
properties.Opening time: Helpline callback (not staffed live; returns within 2–3 business days)
properties.Short description: Coordinates referrals and support; helpline and street outreach across Nassau/Suffolk.

properties.Name: Nassau University Medical Center (NuHealth)
properties.Opening time: Emergency Department open 24/7
properties.Short description: Public safety-net hospital; emergency medicine services available 24/7.

properties.Name: Harmony Healthcare – Elmont
properties.Opening time: Mon 8AM–8PM; Tue 8AM–8PM; Wed 8AM–4PM; Thu 8AM–8PM; Fri 8AM–6PM; Sat 9AM–1PM
properties.Short description: Community health center providing primary care + dental + WIC and other services.

properties.Name: Harmony Healthcare – Freeport
properties.Opening time: Mon 8AM–8PM; Tue 8AM–8PM; Wed 8AM–4PM; Thu 8AM–8PM; Fri 8AM–6PM; Sat 9AM–1PM
properties.Short description: Community health center providing primary care + dental and other services.

properties.Name: Harmony Healthcare – Hempstead
properties.Opening time: Mon 8AM–8PM; Tue 8AM–8PM; Wed 8AM–4PM; (see site for Thu/Fri/Sat)
properties.Short description: Community health center providing primary care and dental; extended hours on select days.

properties.Name: Harmony Healthcare – Oceanside
properties.Address: 3227 Long Beach Road, Suite 2, Oceanside, NY 11572
properties.Opening time: Mon 8AM–8PM; Tue 8AM–8PM; Wed 8AM–4PM; Thu 8AM–4PM; Fri 8AM–4PM; Sat Closed; Sun Closed
properties.Short description: Community health center providing primary care and referrals.

properties.Name: Harmony Healthcare – Roosevelt
properties.Opening time: Mon 8AM–8PM; Tue 8AM–8PM; Wed 8AM–4PM; Thu 8AM–8PM; Fri 8AM–6PM; Sat 8AM–12PM (Medical), 9AM–1PM (Dental)
properties.Short description: Community health center providing primary care + dental + WIC and other services.

properties.Name: Harmony Healthcare – Westbury
properties.Opening time: Mon 8AM–8PM; Tue 8AM–8PM; Wed 8AM–4PM; Thu 8AM–8PM; Fri 8AM–6PM; Sat 9AM–1PM
properties.Short description: Community health center providing primary care + dental + specialty services + WIC.

properties.Name: Legal Services of Long Island (LSLI) – Hempstead Office
properties.Address: 1 Helen Keller Way, 5th Floor, Hempstead, NY 11550
properties.Opening time: Mon–Fri 9:00 AM–5:00 PM (call for intake)
properties.Short description: Free civil legal aid for low-income and disabled Long Islanders (housing/eviction, benefits, family issues, etc.).

properties.Name: Nassau County Bar Association – Lawyer Referral Information Service (LRIS)
properties.Address: 133 15th Street (GPS), Mineola, NY 11501 (building at 15th & West Streets)
properties.Opening time: Mon–Fri 9:00 AM–5:00 PM
properties.Short description: Lawyer referral service; can also refer callers who can’t afford counsel to other agencies.

properties.Name: Legal Aid Society of Nassau County
properties.Opening time: Not listed publicly (call for hours)
properties.Short description: Nonprofit providing legal representation for indigent individuals (typically by court appointment).

properties.Name: Mary Brennan INN Soup Kitchen (The INN)
properties.Opening time: Mon–Fri 9:00 AM–2:00 PM (sit-down); To-go meals until 4:30 PM (per site)
properties.Short description: Soup kitchen + pantry bags and essential item distribution (weekday operations).

properties.Name: Island Harvest – Uniondale Office (donation drop-off)
properties.Opening time: Mon–Fri 8:00 AM–3:30 PM (drop-off hours listed)
properties.Short description: Food bank office/warehouse drop-off site; supports a large partner network across Long Island.

properties.Name: Long Island Cares – Nassau Center for Collaborative Assistance
properties.Opening time: Mon/Wed/Fri 9:00 AM–3:00 PM; Tue/Thu 9:00 AM–4:00 PM
properties.Short description: Nassau service center for food assistance and support services.

properties.Name: Long Island Cares – West Nassau Center for Food Assistance & Community Support
properties.Opening time: Office: M–F 8:15 AM–4:15 PM; Pantry: M–F 9:00 AM–3:30 PM (see site for details)
properties.Short description: Food pantry/service center (First Stop pantry).
